description.displayText: Could not ask for a better person to care for my mom. She is professional courteous and a pleasure to be around.
description.originalText: Could not ask for a better person to care for my mom. She is professional courteous and a pleasure to be around.

description.displayText:
Elida has worked with and for me since November 1,  2015.

I had a hip replacement operation and was initially bedridden; then on a walker; later, crutches; and, finally, a cane.

Elida cared for me seven days per week by:

1. Preparing meals
2. Shopping for me
3. Helping me with personal hygiene
4. Helping me get dressed
5. Helping me perform physical therapy exercises
6. Cleaning my apartment
7. Accompanying me to doctors' visits
8. Taking laundry and dry cleaning to the Laundromat and dry cleaner; then, 
    retrieving it

Elida is a consummate health care professional who could not have been more caring.

Elida has also proven to be scrupulously honest.
